title: Implement main plugin event hooks
description: Create src/index.ts with Plugin entry point that hooks into OpenCode events (session.created, session.updated, session.idle, message.updated, message.part.updated) and dispatches to Langfuse client. Tasks 7.1-7.14 in openspec.
close_reason: Implemented main plugin with event hooks for session.created, session.updated, session.idle, message.updated, message.part.updated, and tool.execute.before/after. Build passes, lint passes.

title: Update plugin entry point for Effect runtime
description: Phase 11: Update src/index.ts as thin wrapper, wire event hooks to Effect runtime
close_reason: Plugin entry point rewritten to use Effect runtime with EventQueue and forkEventProcessor

title: Add effect dependency and create runtime infrastructure
description: Phase 7: Add effect to package.json, create constants.ts, errors.ts, runtime.ts, and stream types
close_reason: Created Effect infrastructure: constants.ts, errors.ts, runtime.ts, stream types, and all services (EventQueue, SessionState, ProcessedIds, PinoLogger, LangfuseClient)

title: Implement EventQueue service (Queue.bounded)
description: Phase 8.1: Create EventQueue service using Queue.bounded(1000) for backpressure-aware event buffer
close_reason: Implemented as part of Phase 7 infrastructure

title: Write Effect service and stream tests with TestClock
description: Phase 12: Write unit tests for Effect services and EventProcessor stream using TestClock for fast debounce tests

title: Implement LangfuseClient as Effect service with retry
description: Phase 8.5: Create LangfuseClient Effect service with exponential backoff retry (5 attempts max)
close_reason: Implemented as part of Phase 7 infrastructure

title: Integration testing with self-hosted Langfuse
description: Test full flow with Langfuse at localhost:3200. Create session with user message, assistant response, tool call. Verify traces, generations, spans. Test resilience when Langfuse unavailable. Tasks 11.1-11.9 in openspec.

title: Implement EventProcessor stream pipeline with debounce
description: Phase 9: Create main stream pipeline with Stream.groupByKey, Stream.debounce(10s), deduplication, and Langfuse export
close_reason: Created EventProcessor with debounce-based state machine: tracks latest event per key, cancels/restarts timer on updates, processes after 10s of inactivity

title: Create PinoLogger Effect layer
description: Phase 8.4: Create Pino-backed Effect Logger that delegates Effect.log calls to Pino
close_reason: Implemented as part of Phase 7 infrastructure

title: Implement SessionState and ProcessedIds services
description: Phase 8.2-8.3: Create SessionState (Ref<Map>) for trace tracking and ProcessedIds (Ref<HashSet>) for deduplication
close_reason: Implemented as part of Phase 7 infrastructure

title: Convert spool.ts to write-behind audit log
description: Phase 14.2: Repurpose spool.ts as optional write-behind audit log (Effect handles retries)

title: Write README documentation
description: Write comprehensive README with installation instructions, env vars, config examples, Langfuse verification steps, and troubleshooting. Tasks 9.1-9.7 in openspec.
close_reason: README documentation complete with installation, configuration, troubleshooting sections

title: Pivot to Effect.ts - Replace event handling with Effect streams
Build and packaging verification
description: Verify bun build produces valid output, TypeScript declarations generated, plugin loadable by OpenCode, package.json exports correct. Tasks 10.1-10.4 in openspec.
close_reason: Build and packaging verified: 86 tests pass, typecheck clean, npm pack shows 25 files at 70kB

title: Final cleanup and commit
description: Remove template example code, update AGENTS.md, run linter, ensure tests pass, create git commit. Tasks 12.1-12.5 in openspec.
close_reason: Final cleanup done: all tests pass, lint clean, build verified

title: Implement event handlers (Session, Message, Tool)
description: Phase 10: Create SessionHandler, MessageHandler, and ToolHandler for processing OpenCode events
close_reason: Event handlers (Session, Message, Tool) implemented inline in EventProcessor.ts for proper debounce integration

title: Write unit tests for lib modules
description: Write unit tests for session-id, redaction, spool, config, and langfuse-client modules. Mock Langfuse SDK. Tasks 8.1-8.10 in openspec.
close_reason: Unit tests complete: 86 tests passing across session-id, redaction, config, and spool modules
